instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PERSONAL' and tap Security . Tap Set up SIM card lock . If unselected, select the Lock SIM card check box, enter the current PIN code and tap OK . Tap Change SIM PIN . Enter the old SIM PIN code. The default SIM PIN code is 1234 . Tap OK . Enter the new SIM PIN code. Tap OK . Enter the new SIM PIN code again to confirm. Tap OK .
From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PERSONAL' and tap Security . Tap Set up SIM card lock . Tap the Lock SIM card check box to turn it on or off.
